# Ocean (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers (Su):** You have the supernatural ability to breathe water as if under the effect of a *[[Water Breathing (Spell)|water breathing]]* spell, for up to 1 minute per level. This effect occurs automatically as soon as it applies, lasts until it runs out or is no longer needed, and can operate multiple times per day (up to the total daily time limit).

**Ocean Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Endure Elements (Spell)|Endure Elements]]****:** Exist comfortably in hot or cold environments.

**2** **[[Sound Burst (Spell)|Sound Burst]]****:** Deals 1d8 sonic damage to subjects, might also stun them.

**3** **[[Water Breathing (Spell)|Water Breathing]]****:** Subjects can breathe underwater.

**4** **[[Freedom of Movement]]****:** Subject moves normally despite impediments.

**5** **[[Wall of Ice (Spell)|Wall of Ice]]****:** Ice plane creates wall with 15 hp +1/level, or hemisphere can trap creatures inside.

**6** **[[Freezing Sphere (Spell)|Freezing Sphere]]****:** Freezes water or deals cold damage.

**7 [[Waterspout (Spell)|Waterspout]]:** Water rises up into a whirling vortex that deals 3d8 damage and sucks creatures in.

**8 [[Maelstrom (Spell)|Maelstrom]]:** Water vortex traps and damages creatures and objects.

**9** **[[Elemental Swarm (Spell)|Elemental Swarm]]****:** Summons multiple elementals.\*

  \*Cast as a water spell only.
